Description: Weight: fals weight of 24 kharrūba. Seven line Kufic inscription with a 6 pointed star above end of fourth line. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: The star is an addition on the die (cf. 1978,0503.1 and OA+ 4160). The 12-kharrūba shaṭr weights provide the half denomination of this type.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (41)
